Recent examples of the machine learning and data analysis work I'm

## Modeling  

Identify leads most likely to convert.  

In-production to prioritize lead nurturing and identify opportunities
for marketing to re-engage.

Uses tidymodel tools (dials, parsnip, recipes, rsample & 
yardstick).

Data is de-identified and used with permission.

## Visualization  

Visualizing the current state of Electronic Health Record
Interoperability.   

One of the [top 10 articles](https://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/top-10-healthcare-it-news-articles-2018) from 2018 at 
[Healthcare IT News](https://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/why-ehr-data-interoperability-such-mess-3-charts).  

Uses data.table to sythensize 4 million records.

Data is publically available.
